statements: SELECT * FROM TemperatureMonitoring WHERE shipment_id = 12345;
SELECT shipment_id, product_name, temperature FROM TemperatureMonitoring WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT shipment_id, product_name, temperature, timestamp FROM TemperatureMonitoring WHERE timestamp < '2021-09-15';
SELECT * FROM TemperatureMonitoring ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT shipment_id, product_name FROM TemperatureMonitoring WHERE product_name = 'Apples';
SELECT * FROM TemperatureMonitoring ORDER BY shipment_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT shipment_id, product_name FROM TemperatureMonitoring WHERE temperature > 20 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT shipment_id, product_name, temperature, timestamp FROM TemperatureMonitoring WHERE temperature < 10 AND product_name LIKE '%fruit%' ORDER BY temperature ASC
SELECT * FROM TemperatureMonitoring WHERE product_name = 'Apples' OR product_name = 'Oranges' AND temperature BETWEEN 15 AND 25 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS average_temperature, COUNT(*) AS total_shipments FROM TemperatureMonitoring
SELECT * FROM temperature_sensors WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT location, temperature FROM temperature_sensors WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT transfer_id, transfer_date, from_location, to_location FROM cross_docking_transfers WHERE product_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM temperature_sensors ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT location, temperature FROM temperature_sensors WHERE location LIKE '%kitchen%' AND temperature < 20;
SELECT * FROM temperature_sensors WHERE location LIKE 'Room%' ORDER BY sensor_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT sensor_id, location, temperature FROM temperature_sensors WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY location ASC, temperature DESC;
SELECT transfer_id, transfer_date, from_location, to_location FROM cross_docking_transfers WHERE transfer_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY transfer_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sensor_id, location, temperature FROM temperature_sensors WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY temperature ASC, sensor_id ASC;
SELECT transfer_id, from_location, to_location FROM cross_docking_transfers WHERE to_location = 'Warehouse A' OR to_location = 'Warehouse B' ORDER BY transfer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM temperature_logs;
SELECT product_name, timestamp FROM temperature_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT product_name, temperature FROM temperature_logs WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT product_name, MAX(temperature) FROM temperature_logs GROUP BY product_name;
SELECT product_name, COUNT(*) FROM temperature_logs GROUP BY product_name ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT * FROM temperature_logs WHERE temperature > 25.0 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temperature FROM temperature_logs GROUP BY product_name HAVING AVG(temperature) > 20.0;
SELECT product_name, timestamp FROM transfer_logs WHERE status = 'completed' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT tl.log_id, tl.product_name, dl.location_name FROM temperature_logs tl JOIN docking_locations dl ON tl.log_id = dl.location_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS transfer_count, tl.product_name FROM transfer_logs tl GROUP BY tl.product_name ORDER BY transfer_count DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM ProductInventory ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM ProductInventory WHERE temperature_requirements='cool';
SELECT warehouse_name, location FROM Warehouse WHERE location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM TransferLogs WHERE transfer_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, temperature FROM ProductInventory JOIN TemperatureLog ON ProductInventory.id = TemperatureLog.product_id;
SELECT * FROM ProductInventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT id, product_name, quantity FROM ProductInventory WHERE temperature_requirements = 'Cool' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT product_name, temperature_requirements FROM ProductInventory WHERE id IN (SELECT product_id FROM TransferLogs WHERE warehouse_id = 1);
SELECT * FROM Warehouse WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY warehouse_name;
SELECT product_name, temperature FROM ProductInventory AS PI JOIN TemperatureLog AS TL ON PI.id = TL.product_id WHERE temperature < 0 ORDER BY product_name, temperature DESC;
SELECT * FROM temperature_sensors;
SELECT product_id, name FROM products WHERE temperature_sensitive = TRUE;
SELECT to_location, transfer_time FROM cross_docking WHERE transfer_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT sensor_id, temperature FROM temperature_sensors ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT log_id, alert_type, alert_message FROM alerts WHERE alert_id < 10;
SELECT * FROM temperature_sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM temperature_sensors WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT products.name, temperature_sensors.location FROM products INNER JOIN temperature_sensors ON products.temperature_sensitive = TRUE AND products.product_id = temperature_sensors.sensor_id;
SELECT DISTINCT to_location FROM cross_docking WHERE transfer_time >= NOW();
SELECT log_id, alert_type, alert_message FROM alerts JOIN transfer_log ON alerts.log_id = transfer_log.log_id WHERE temperature > 30;
